dt.patient:
SELECT
	"Patientennummer"	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	p21.fall
ORDER BY
	"Patientennummer";
dt.gender:
SELECT
	"Geschlecht"	AS	"patient_gender",
"Patientennummer"	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	p21.fall
ORDER BY
	"Patientennummer";
dt.zipcode:
SELECT
	"KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"patient_identifier_value",
"PLZ"	AS	"patient_address_postalCode"
FROM
	p21.fall
ORDER BY
	"Patientennummer";
dt.birthdate:
SELECT
	"Geburtsjahr"	AS	"patient_birthDate",
"Patientennummer"	AS	"patient_identifier_value"
FROM
	p21.fall
ORDER BY
	"Patientennummer";
dt.encounter:
SELECT
	"KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
"Patientennummer"	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_identifier_value"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "Patientennummer";
dt.encounterstart:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Aufnahmedatum"	AS	"encounter_period_start"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.encounterend:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Entlassungsdatum"	AS	"encounter_period_end"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.ageindays:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Alter-in-Tagen-am-Aufnahmetag"	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_days"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.ageinyears:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Alter-in-Jahren-am-Aufnahmetag"	AS	"encounter_subject_patient_age_years"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.admission:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Aufnahmeanlass"	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_admitSource"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.hospitalization:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Aufnahmegrund"	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_class"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.discharge:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "Entlassungsgrund"	AS	"encounter_hospitalization_dischargeDisposition"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.ventilation:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  "Beatmungsstunden"	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code_40617009"
FROM
  p21.fall
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.condition:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  "ICD-Kode"	AS	"condition_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21.icd
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.conditioncategory:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"condition_encounter_identifier_value",
  "Diagnoseart"	AS	"encounter_diagnosis_rank"
FROM
  p21.icd
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.procedure:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  "OPS-Kode"	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21.ops
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.proceduredate:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  "OPS-Datum"	AS	"procedure_performedDateTime"
FROM
  p21.ops
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.procedure_medication:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"procedure_encounter_identifier_value",
  "OPS-Kode"	AS	"procedure_code_coding_code"
FROM
  p21.ops
WHERE
  "OPS-Kode" LIKE '6-00%'
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.provider:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "FAB"	AS	"location_identifier_value"
FROM
  p21.fab
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.providerstart:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "FAB-Aufnahmedatum"	AS	"encounter_location_period_start"
FROM
  p21.fab
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
dt.providerend:
SELECT
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen"	AS	"encounter_identifier_value",
  "FAB-Entlassungsdatum"	AS	"encounter_location_period_end"
FROM
  p21.fab
ORDER BY
  "KH-internes-Kennzeichen";
